meanings.sent1: The soil in the forest was humusy and rich in nutrients.
meanings.sent2: The garden beds were humusy, perfect for growing vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The humusy earth seemed to whisper secrets to the plants growing in it.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a humusy blend of memories and dreams.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the humusy soil brought back memories of childhood adventures.

meanings.definition: Covered with or consisting of humus.
meanings.sent1: The forest floor was soft and humusy under our feet.
meanings.sent2: The compost pile was dark and humusy, ready to be used in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The humusy path through the woods was a favorite spot for morning walks.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was a tangle of humusy strands after playing in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The humusy smell of the earth filled the air after the rain.
